amendment.description: To establish a 60-vote point of order relative to the Social Security Trust Fund.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 2705 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 2705 proposed by Senator Voinovich. (consideration: CR S2525-2529, S2531; text: CR S2525) To establish a 60-vote point of order relative to the Social Security Trust Fund.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2705 proposed by Senator Voinovich.
